column2: Bribed Gravedigger
Gravediggers can be paid for other services: information, minor crimes, blood, etc...
Influenced Undertaker
Through a combination of money, blackmail and supernatural abilities: an important Undertaker, his underlings and his access to the necropolis has come under your control.
Controlled Necropolis
A large Necropolis has come under your control.
Ghouled Sexton
You have ghouled a Sexton who looks afer a large Necropolis.
Zombie Horde
You have used your control of a Necropolis and your disciplines to assemble a large cohort of zombies.
Minimal Rookery
A minimal rookery with just enough resources to hatch a few gargoyles.
Small Rookery
A small rookery that has adequate resources to hatch gargoyles.
Large Rookery
A large rookery that has trained assistants and resources to produce numerous gargoyles.
Ghouled Assistant
You have ghouled an assistant to provide better oversight and improve gargoyle creation.
Masterful Rookery
Your mastery of Thaumaturgy and experience producing gargoyles led you to create new equipment and techniques.  This allows you to produce gargoyles at a masterful pace.
Tiny Oubliette
A tiny oubliette, just one room, that can be used to summon shades and study the abyss.
Small Oubliette
A small oubliette, a small dungeon, that can be used to summon shades and study the abyss.
Large Oubliette
A large oubliette, a large and twisting dungeon, that can be used to summon shades and study the abyss.
Master of Shades
Your mastery of Obtenebration and experience producing shades led you to create new equipment and techniques.  This allows you to summon and control shades without peer.
Bribed Leper
Lepers can be paid for other services: information, minor crimes, blood, etc...
Influenced Nun
Through a combination of money, blackmail and supernatural abilities: an important nun in a leper colony, her underlings and her access to the leper colony has come under your control.
Controlled Leper Colony
A large Leper Colony has come under your control.
Ghouled Leper Headman
You have ghouled a Leper Headman who leads a Leper Colony.
Conditioned Lepers
You have used your control of a Leper Colony and your discipline of domination to condition all of it's lepers.
Meager Cult
A meager cult with a handful of followers and little influence.
Small Priesthood
Through a combination of money, coercion and supernatural abilities: a small priesthood has grown to lead your cult.
Large Cult
A large cult with numerous followers and large influence on the surrounding area.
Ghouled Demagogue
You have ghouled a Demagogue who brings in converts and influence for your cult.
Conditioned Cultists
You have used your control of your Cult and your discipline of domination to condition all of it's cultists.
Meager Cult
A meager cult with a handful of followers and little influence.
Small Priesthood
Through a combination of money, coercion and supernatural abilities: a small priesthood has grown to lead your cult.
Large Cult
A large cult with numerous followers and large influence on the surrounding area.
Ghouled Demagogue
You have ghouled a Demagogue who brings in converts and influence for your cult.
Conditioned Cultists
You have used your control of your Cult and your discipline of domination to condition all of it's cultists.
Basic Flesh Chapel
A basic Flesh Chapel with just enough resources to create a few of mighty Vozhd.
Small Flesh Chapel
A small Flesh Chapel that has adequate resources to create a handful of mighty Vozhd.
Large Flesh Chapel
A large Flesh Chapel that has trained assistants and resources to produce a number of mighty Vozhd.
Ghouled Assistant
You have ghouled an assistant to provide better oversight and improve Vozhd creation.
Masterful Flesh Chapel
Your mastery of Vicissitude and experience producing szlachta led you to create new equipment and techniques.  This allows you to produce Vozhd at an astounding pace.
